title: Teemo :(

embed.description: Non vous ne rêvez pas. Oui, Riot a décidé de toucher à Teemo. Icône satanique du MOBA pour de nombreux joueurs, il est chéri au possible par l'autre partie des joueurs. Le petit yordle reste donc un perso' "fun" que les gens pickent d'habitude pour "troll" plus qu'autre chose (même si certains le jouent on ne peut plus sérieusement, avec réussite).

body:
Hey, is it a joke?
Is Teemo ACTUALLY getting reworked?
If yes, Riot decided to kill him. 
GOSH HE IS GOOD WHY REWORKING HIM TO MAKE HIM BECOME MORE SATAN
Please tell me is it a joke.

To little Teemo
Eh, he was good
Eh, nobody loved him, but i did
Maybe its just a joke
Oh, please.

read the first letter.


{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:17}}

replies.body: The rework you're looking at happened a year and a half ago.
Look at the date on the story.
Thats old and his passive was changed to just invis on brush move instead of 1/2 time because that was too fast
The document you linked is in a different language so I can't understand what is going on
